Veterinary Specialist Hospital and 24-hour animal emergency centre, open 7 days a week.

Make an enquiry
Call 24hr Emerg.

Who We Are

CARE is specialist pet referral hospital for both surgery and internal medicine.

We perform all types of Specialist Surgery: for example, hip replacement, complex fracture repair, knee reconstruction, abdominal or thoracic surgery.
